reasoning: Liposarcoma is extremely rare in children (<5% of pediatric soft tissue sarcomas). Pediatric soft tissue sarcomas: ~0.9 per 100k; liposarcoma represents <0.05 per 100k children. Case reports only.
source: Ferrari A et al. (2005). Soft tissue sarcomas in children and adolescents: the prognostic role of tumor size in relation to patient body size. J Clin Oncol. 23(2):371-6
